section.heading: Resident Council Advisory Board and tenant election of members of resident councils and Resident Council Advisory Board.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90-day) repeal of sections, see § 29 of the District of Columbia Housing Authority Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-259, February 9, 2000, 47 DCR 1129).
For temporary (90-day) repeal of sections, see § 29 of the District of Columbia Housing Authority Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-346, June 5, 2000, 47 DCR 4980).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Purpose of Law 10-243: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 6-251.
